page.title: 20Village Schools
page.content: The villages are served by five {schools:}four primary (5/11yrs) and one comprehensive (11/18). All of these schools belong traditionally to the Lambton & Hetton or Houghton area of the Borough lying to the south of Washington and west of Sunderland. Of the primary schools one, Our Lady Queen of Peace School Penshaw,is{Roman {Catholic.}The other three, Barnwell, New Penshaw and Shiney Row Junior, are all non-denominational and feed the larger Secondary School at Shiney Row. The last four schools took part in the Project, which allowed them to forge closer links with each other in this co-operative study. Visits were made and research undertaken in an attempt to give a clear impression of an area of contrasts and we hope these contrasts shine through to reflect an area of interest and character.
